to1D

public Matrix1D to1D()
Returns a deep copy of the current matrix in 1D form. The matrix is filled row-wise (i.e. one row at a time) and, in the case of a 3D matrix, from the top layer downwards.

Specified by:
to1D in class Matrix
Returns:
a deep copy in 1D form.

to2D

public abstract Matrix2D to2D(int rowCount)
                       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Returns a deep copy of the current matrix in 2D form with a specified number of rows. The matrix is filled row-wise from the top left corner.

Parameters:
rowCount - the number of rows
Returns:
a deep copy in 2D form.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

getSubmatrixByRow

public abstract Matrix1D getSubmatrixByRow(int startRow,
                                           int endRow)
                                    throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Returns a subset of the current matrix between (and including) the two rows.

Parameters:
startRow - the start row
endRow - the end row
Returns:
a subset of the current matrix by row
